item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US Space Force warns of ‘mind-boggling’ build-up of Chinese capabilities
2. Trump says Liz Cheney is ‘war hawk’ who should face ‘guns trained on her’
3. Budget poses new challenge for UK public finances, Moody’s warns
4. Sick man of Europe? Germany’s bosses sound alarm on staff illness
5. [Opinion] Should you ever buy a stock index at a record high?
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
